release_notes.en-US:
README version 1.5

Title: TaskviewLayout

Required addons: Lightning.

Description:
Taskview layout.
Put task view up to read document of long sentences.
Put task view neutrally to read tree lists.
Put task view vertically to read document in which records are many.
For height of neutrally horizontal view, it is changeable before any event.
For changing sizes of vertical task view, they are not available,
it is good not to resize task tree which was shrunk enough.
Instead, See task view to close Today pane.
Please, let me know whether default sizes of task tree, task view are needed to change them.
praise Cardinal Soo-Hwan, Kim.

December 01 2019.

From Sungho Hwang.

description.en-US:
Put task view up to read document of long sentences.
Put task view neutrally to read tree lists.
Put task view vertically to read document in which records are many.
For height of neutrally horizontal view, it is changeable before any event.
For changing sizes of vertical task view, they are not available,
it is good not to resize task tree which was shrunk enough.
Please, let me know whether default sizes of task tree, task view are needed to change them.

[Notification]
Vertical task view is sensitive for flex.
So, if having any changes of calendar or task flexes, 
Screen of vertical task view is cut due to the above.
Please, restart Thunderbird in this case.

Version 21.0.
In vertical task view scripts, all flexes are deleted except for calendar display deck.
Perhaps, these flexes influence task view screen.
Calendar display deck flex was changed as '0 2 0';

Screen of vertical task view is cut after 21 clicks of menu in version 18.1
In the next version 21.0, this screen cut is shown after 41 clicks of menu.

Version 25.2.
Scripts were many reduced.
Although Functionality is as it is, 
scripts are different with old scripts.
Unstable vertical task view screen was improved.

VERSIONS FROM 25.3 to 55.3 WERE NOT TO WORK PROPERLY.

Version 55.6.
Button disappearance was solved.
It is stable with button fixed in Thunderbird 71.0 beta.
FORTUNATELY! It is more stable in 72.0b1 than 71.0b.
So, I use Thunderbird 72.0b1 now.
Thanks Mozilla Calendar Project team! \o/

Version 57.0 (upcoming)
Horizontal/vertical task views were resizable.
Horizontal/vertical task views are not changing when clicking other tabs.
Functionality of TaskviewLayout has been completed.
Flex refresh button was added to edit item description.

Version 57.1 (upcoming)
JsonToDOM scripts were used to port messenger.xhtml over TB73.

praise Cardinal Soo-Hwan, Kim.
